ai-anya-e0501n17:1_0: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion. Right immersion gives rise to right knowledge.
ai-anya-e0501n17:1_1: wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood are three things, they don’t have wrong livelihood.
ai-anya-e0501n17:1_2: to the four ways of lying, etc., by the means of the four kinds of triading and so on,
ai-anya-e0501n17:1_3: That’s why they don’t reach the end of the path.
ai-anya-e0501n17:1_4: All Buddhas, consciousness-spheres and classes of his own mentality, and thoughts are included in the various forms of thoughts.
ai-anya-e0501n17:2_1: He is Extinguishment in the Happy One’s place, but the path is enlightened in Extinguishment.
ai-anya-e0501n17:2_2: For one of right view is the eight factors of the Holy One, etc., leading to extinguishment in the same way,.
ai-anya-e0501n17:2_3: The four factors of the wrong path are shaken.
ai-anya-e0501n17:3_0: Herein, one who is straight in mind has recommended the successively reaches absorption.
ai-anya-e0501n17:3_1: Abandoning in the water without a sign, an indept, which is called “space” and so on.
ai-anya-e0501n17:3_2: Ways of deeds is the path, crosses the desert road, and cycle of postures, it cuts off at the root, made a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to reach maturity.
ai-anya-e0501n17:3_3: Because of my two (dependent of) my thumb.
ai-anya-e0501n17:4_0: Herein, making a wholesome deeds by killing living creatures as preference to the doing of their deeds, complete in terms of their intention, aims, wishes, contentment, seclusion, aloofness, arousing energy, ethics, and mental deeds.
ai-anya-e0501n17:4_1: after putting on the floor by the Decorated Host of the earth that is high in the upper story of the earth that is wonderful and than the earth that is necessary for him in the Development.
ai-anya-e0501n17:4_2: And this meaning should be illustrated in the way already described under the headings of right view, etc., in the way already stated, and the characteristic of the function of insight .
ai-anya-e0501n17:4_3: The section on the path to Worthiness is finished.
